Richard Hello.

Adriana Hi, Richard. It's Adriana.

Richard How are things in Recife?

Adriana Not good, I'm afraid. The problem is bigger than we thought.

Richard Oh no! Not because of the new components? They were so expensive!

Adriana No, I know they were the most expensive solution, but they were also the best idea.

Richard So what's the real problem?

Adriana Well, Pedro says the new components are worse than the old components, but the team leaders say they are better, and I agree.

Richard So are you saying the problem isn't technical?

Adriana That's right. I think it's a personnel problem. Do you know that staff turnover in Recife is the highest? Our other factories are about thirty per cent lower.

Richard Wow. That is surprising. So the problem is the team?

Adriana No, not the team. It's the Line Manager. The biggest problem is Pedro. No one likes him.
